desc-with-translation.zh: Input 组件用于捕获来自用户的文本输入，它使用 v-model，类似于常规输入。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: The Input component is used to capture text input from the user using a v-model, similar to regular input.
Type of the input box

desc-with-translation.zh: 输入框的防抖间隔，值为 0 时表示不开启防抖。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: Enter the anti-shake interval of the box. If the value is 0, anti-shake is not enabled.
Read-only input field
Disable input field
Autofocus input box
Enter the value bound to the box
Form style
A placeholder for the input field

desc-with-translation.zh: 聚焦时表单容器的样式
desc-with-translation.en-ai: Focus on the style of the form container
The contents to the left of the container
The contents to the right of the container
Enter the content to the left of the box
Enter the content to the right of the box
Gain focus
Lose focus
Clear

desc-with-translation.zh: Input 组件由原生 input 标签和包裹它的容器组成，为了在容器边框宽度变化时不让文字抖动，所有与边框相关的样式都应该要作用到容器的伪元素 before 上，对于聚焦时的边框样式，通过 focusedContainerClass 属性来设置。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: The Input component consists of the native input tag and the container that wraps it. In order to keep text from jitter when the container border width changes, all bezel-related styles should be applied to the container pseudo-element before. For focused border styles, This is set using the focusedContainerClass attribute.

desc-with-translation.zh: 点击含有 clearable 属性的元素后，会点击清空表单的值，
desc-with-translation.en-ai: After clicking on the element with the clearable attribute, it will click on the value to clear the form,

desc-with-translation.zh: 当 type 为 password 时，点击含有 password 属性的元素时可以切换密码的可见性。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: When type is password, you can switch the visibility of the password when you click on the element with the password attribute.
